node.title: April 2022's ThreeFold Product Updates
node.excerpt: ThreeFold V3.0.0 Alpha-5 is officially released with upgrades and improvements to various TF Grid componenents. Dig in!

node.title: Update on the Binance Smart Chain Integration
node.excerpt: We are happy to update that the BSC integration is going just as planned and next week, TFT will be available there.

node.title: Liquid Hacked, TFT Not Affected
node.excerpt: Liquid, an exchange on which TFT is listed, has been hacked. It appears TFT was not affected.

node.title: Liquid Receives $120 Million in Debt Financing From FTX
node.excerpt: The owner and operator of top tier exchange FTX finances Liquid and enters discussions around further collaboration.

node.title: Why ThreeFold chose Stellar
node.excerpt: At ThreeFold, together with a beautiful ecosystem of partners, we are co-creating a peer-to-peer Internet that empowers equality, freedom, and sustainability.

node.title: Building the Future We Want to Live In â€“ A Four Step Journey
node.excerpt: Driven by our planet-first, people-first philosophy, the ThreeFold movement is shaping the world we want to live in and laying the foundation for an open, inclusive and abundance-based future.

node.title: An Intro to the ThreeFold Token
node.excerpt: The ThreeFold Token (TFT) is a decentralized digital currency used to buy autonomous and decentralized Internet services (compute, storage, and application) on the ThreeFold Grid.

node.title: The need for ThreeFold's neutral internet
node.excerpt: The Internet is no longer the neutral place it used to be. +80% of the Internet capacity is delivered by a handful of companies.

node.title: Planting the Seeds: ThreeFold's Plans to Regenerate the Planet
node.excerpt: We believe our planet needs regenerative solutions at a large scale. ThreeFold and Take Action Global (TAG) are on a mission to regenerate the planet together.

node.title: A Journey through the Decentralization and Blockchain Space â€“ Part Two: Akash
node.excerpt: This post is the second one in a series to explore fellow projects and their solutions with regards to what they share with ThreeFold but also where we differ. Follow me on my journey through the space. This time, we're looking into Akash!

node.title: Co-create the new Internet. Participate with TFT!
node.excerpt: Do you believe that the world needs change? Do you believe in decentralization? Equality? Sustainability?..
